Module Description¶

The api can be found in the templated_yaml.api module.

templated_yaml.api.render_from_path(path, context={})¶

Renders a templated yaml document from file path.

Parameters:
  • path – A path to the yaml file to process.
  • context – A context to overlay on the yaml file. This will override any yaml values.
Returns:

A dict with the final overlayed configration.
templated_yaml.api.render_from_string(content, context={})¶

Renders a templated yaml document from a string.

Parameters:
  • content – The yaml string to evaluate.
  • context – A context to overlay on the yaml file. This will override any yaml values.
Returns:

A dict with the final overlayed configration.
